title: COWI Typeface
content:
Hi All!

Does anyone know what this font is? I’m sure it’s an easy one, I’m having a bad Friday and can’t work it out! Cowi’s a Danish company, btw.

Cheers

Si

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cowi.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235244/http:/typophile.com/files/cowi.jpg) | 4.63 KB |

 [‹ (x) Baltic contemporary art centre - Baltic Affisch (custom) {Robert}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235244/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16311 "Go to previous forum topic") [Risky Business 80s script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235244/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16319 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Duckworth

comments.content: As this is a logo it could well be customised or even entirely custom designed.

Thanks Guys!

I thought it looked like a familiar face I couldn’t quite place - I’m not great at identifying serifs, I thought it was just me!

Not to worry, I expect you’re right Yves, it’s probably a custom job.

Anyway, thankyou both for your input,

Si

Talkin’ about ’lookin’ familiar’.: Even classic ’Clarendon’ may be an alternate..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080215235244/http:/www.formlos.net/)
